data.meta_description: Logitail - NetSuite ERP & e-Commerce Solution Provider is a Technology, Information and Internet, Internet Service Providers, Website Hosting & Internet-Related Services, and Telecommunications company_reader located in Kontich, Flanders with $2 million in revenue and 7 employees. Find top employees, contact details and business statistics at RocketReach.
data.text:
Logitail is a leading NetSuite solution provider, offering comprehensive ERP & eCommerce solutions for businesses in the Benelux region. This allows us to serve businesses with localized expertise and support. Our in-depth knowledge of the Benelux market enables us to address unique business requirements and deliver tailored solutions that drive growth and success. As a trusted NetSuite solution provider, we take a consultative approach, working closely with clients to understand their unique business needs. By leveraging the power of NetSuite, we develop tailored strategies and solutions that align with their goals and objectives. Whether it's establishing a strong online presence, expanding into new markets, or optimizing existing eCommerce operations, Logitail is committed to delivering success. Partnering with Logitail means gaining access to our expertise, industry insights, and ongoing support. We stay at the forefront of NetSuite advancements and industry trends, ensuring that our clients receive cutting-edge solutions that drive growth and long-term success. With an additional specialization in NetSuite Commerce, we deliver top-notch services to help businesses thrive in the digital marketplace. Our expertise lies in providing end-to-end solutions, from design and implementation to ongoing support. With a deep understanding of the NetSuite SuiteCommerce platform, we help businesses create visually appealing and feature-rich online stores that drive engagement and conversions. Our focus on seamless back-office integration ensures streamlined operations, efficient inventory management, and exceptional customer experiences. Whether you are a business in the EMEA region seeking comprehensive eCommerce solutions or a company in the Benelux region in need of localized Netsuite ERP expertise, Logitail is here to help. Contact us today to unlock the full potential of NetSuite and take your operations to new heights.
